dfe.name: root
dfe.attributes: { style: 'margin: 0px; display: grid; flex-flow : column; background: white' }

dfe.name: locs
dfe.attributes: { haclass: 'div-tab-item-active', focusnew: 1, hfield: 'loc-hdr', rowclass$header: 'div-tab-header', rowclass: 'div-tab-body', rowstyle : 'position: relative; width: 800px; min-height: 19px;' }

dfe.name: loc-hdr
dfe._get:
'Location#' + ($$.index() + 1) + ':
' + $$('.city') + ', ' + $$('.zip') + ''

dfe.name: add-car
dfe._set: var p = $$.append('.car')[0], r = $$.runtime; setTimeout(function() { r.findChildren(r.findControls('cars', $$), 1, 0, 'vin', p).pop().ui.focus()}, 2);  $$.form.countCars($$);

dfe.name: clone-car
dfe._set:
var r = $$.runtime, p = CTab.activeModel(r.findControls('cars', $$)[0]).clone(); $$.form.countCars($$);
setTimeout(function() { ui = r.findChildren(r.findControls('cars', $$), 1, 0, 'vin', p).pop().ui, ui.focus(), ui.setSelectionRange(ui.value.length-6, ui.value.length) }, 2);

dfe.name: cars
dfe.attributes: { haclass: 'div-tab-item-active', focusnew: 1, hfield: 'car-hdr', style: 'width: 100%;', rowclass$header: 'div-tab-header', rowclass: 'div-tab-body div-alt-color2-3', rowstyle: 'padding: 0px; overflow: hidden;' }

dfe.name: car-hdr
dfe._get:
'Vehicle#' + ($$.index(2) + 1) + ':
' + ($$('.hasvin')=='Y' ? $$('.vinnumber') : $$('.make') + ' ' + $$('.modelinfo')) + ''

dfe.name: field-20
dfe._get: 'Vehicle Year, Make and/or Model is not available in dropdown'

dfe.name: vin
dfe.attributes: { spellcheck: 'false', vstrategy: 'notified', trigger: 'change', disabled: $$('.hasvin') != 'Y' && $$('.vinoverride') != 'Y', style: 'width: 150px;', maxlength : 17}

dfe.name: type-choice
dfe._get: { value : $$('.vehicletype'), items : [ {value :'car', description : 'Private Passenger Type'}, {value :'truck', description : 'Truck, Tractor or Trailer'}, { value : 'golf', description : 'Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles' }, { value : 'mobile', description : 'Mobile Homes'}, {value : 'antique', description : 'Antique Autos'}]}

dfe.name: field-34
dfe._get: { value: $$('.VehUseCd'), items: [{value: 'Furnished for Non-Business Use'}, {value: 'All Other'}]}

dfe.name: field-38
dfe._get: { value: $$('.OperExp'), items: [{value: 'No operator licensed less than 5 years'}, {value: 'Licenses less than 5 yrs not owner or principal operator'} , {value: 'Owner or principal operator licensed less than 5 yrs'}]}

dfe.name: field-42
dfe._get: { value: $$('.OperUse'), items: [{value: 'Not driven to work or school'}, {value: 'To of from work less than 15 miles'} , {value: 'To or from work 15 or more miles'}]}

dfe.name: field-51
dfe._get: { value: $$('.VehicleClass'), items: [{value: 'Light Truck 10,000 lbs GVW or less'}, {value: 'Medium Truck 10,001 to 20,000 lbs GVW'}, {value: 'Heavy Truck 20,001 to 45,000 lbs GVW'}, {value: 'Extra-Heavy Truck over 45,000 lbs GVW'}, {value: 'Heavy Truck-Tractor 45,000 lbs GCW or less'}, {value: 'Extra-Heavy Truck-Tractor over 45,000 lbs GCW'}, {value: 'Trailer Types'}] }

dfe.name: field-52
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-55
dfe._get: { value: $$('.TrailerType'), items: [{value: 'Semitrailers'}, {value: 'Trailers'}, { value: 'Service or Utility Trailer (0-200 lbs. Load Capacity)'}]}

dfe.name: field-56
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-57
dfe._get: 'Is this auto used for transporting personnel, tools and equipment to and from a job location where it is parked for the majority of the day?'

dfe.name: field-59
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-61
dfe._get: 'Is this auto used for pick-up and/or delivery of property to residential households?'

dfe.name: field-63
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-65
dfe._get: {value: $$('.RadiusClass'), items: [{value: 'Local up to 50 miles'},{value: 'Intermediate 51 to 200 miles'},{value: 'Long distance over 200 miles'}]}

dfe.name: field-66
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-69
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-71
dfe._get: { value: $$('.SecondaryClass'), items: [{value: 'Truckers'},{value: 'Food Delivery'},{value: 'Specialized Delivery'},{value: 'Waste Disposal'},{value: 'Farmers'},{value: 'Dump & Transit Mix'},{value: 'Contractors'},{value: 'Not Otherwise Specified'}]}

dfe.name: field-72
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-75
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Trucks, Tractors and Trailers'

dfe.name: field-82
dfe._get: ajaxFeed($$, {url: '/AJAXServlet.srv?method=CMAUVehicleScriptHelper&action=getCompDedOptions&vehicleType='+$$('.vehicletype'), param: {value: $$('.coverages.otc.ded')}, name: 'value', headers : {'X-Requested-With': 'Accept'}, noerror: 1, mapper: function(o) { return {value: o.value, description: o.text}}})

dfe.name: field-85
dfe._get: ajaxFeed($$, {url: '/AJAXServlet.srv?method=CMAUVehicleScriptHelper&action=getCollDedOptions&vehicleType='+$$('.vehicletype'), param: {value: $$('.coverages.col.ded')}, name: 'value', headers : {'X-Requested-With': 'Accept'}, noerror: 1, mapper: function(o) { return {value: o.value, description: o.text}}})

dfe.name: field-113
dfe._get: 'Hired Auto - Specified As Covered Auto You Own'

dfe.name: field-126
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles'

dfe.name: field-128
dfe._get: { value: $$('.GolfUse'), items: [{value: 'Used On Golf Course'},{value:'Other Commercial Purposes'}] }

dfe.name: field-129
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles'

dfe.name: field-130
dfe._get: 'Vehicle subject to compulsory, financial or other law'

dfe.name: field-132
dfe._get: 'Apply to all Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles'

dfe.name: field-134
dfe._get: { value : $$('.MobileHomeType'), items : [{value :'Trailer Equipped As Living Quarters'},{value :'Pickup Trucks Used Solely To Transport Camper Bodies'},{value :'Motor Homes Self-Propelled Equipped As Living Quarters'}]}

dfe.name: length-switch
dfe._get: $$('.MobileHomeType') == 'Motor Homes Self-Propelled Equipped As Living Quarters' ? [$$] : []

dfe.name: field-138
dfe._get: { value : $$('.MotorHomeSize'), items : [{value :'Up To 22 feet'},{value :'More Than 22 feet'}]}

dfe.name: field-144
dfe._get:
'Number of Named Individuals for Additional
Broadened PIP'
